name: Toy Store Frenzy
description:
Game submitted to Christmas Jame Gam 2022 (https://itch.io/jam/jame-gam-christmas-edition).

---------------------------

The local toy store has recently started an in-place delivery of their own toys packaged in presents by santa himself! 

They are looking for someone to dress up and give the presents to the most hyperactive kids ever seen. 

Can you do it before the time runs out?

UPDATE 1.0.1

-Added two difficulty levels "Easy" and "Hard" which only impact the time limit where Easy has 300 seconds and Hard has 150.
